commit.message:
Make SyntaxPtr lookup logarithmic

closes #3934

cc https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rowan/pull/81

files.patch:
@@ -323,7 +323,7 @@ dependencies = [
  "const_fn",
  "crossbeam-utils 0.8.1",
  "lazy_static",
- "memoffset",
+ "memoffset 0.6.1",
  "scopeguard",
 ]
 
@@ -908,6 +908,15 @@ dependencies = [
  "winapi 0.3.9",
 ]
